price: 100. It is not for any person to believe, except by the Leave of Allâh, and He will put the wrath on those who are heedless.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَيَجۡعَلُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna linafsin an tu'mina illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi wayajʿalu al-rij'sa ʿalā alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
